posts.post_content: I just noticed that the reminder text for protection ignores that it can't be equipped by anything White either. This is my biggest problem with protection, that players so often forget about equipment - even the acronym to remember the ability, DEBT, only has one E when enchanted and equipped means there should be two. So if for some reason someone wanted an Esper deck with this and [Mask of Riddles](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mask of Riddles), they wouldn't know those two don't go together very well. I otherwise love this card, as I love almost all [White Knight](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=White Knight) variants and most cards with exalted, but it's sad that reminder text, used to help newer players, is actually misleading them.
posts.html:
I just noticed that the reminder text for protection ignores that it can't be equipped by anything White either. This is my biggest problem with protection, that players so often forget about equipment - even the acronym to remember the ability, DEBT, only has one E when enchanted and equipped means there should be two. So if for some reason someone wanted an Esper deck with this and Mask of Riddles, they wouldn't know those two don't go together very well. I otherwise love this card, as I love almost all White Knight variants and most cards with exalted, but it's sad that reminder text, used to help newer players, is actually misleading them.

Posted By: LordBubbles (7/8/2012 7:09:37 PM)
Rating:

@sarroth
Really, they wouldn't be able to attach Mask of Riddles to a creature with Protection from Black anyway, since it can't be targeted by anything Black. The only time it really matters that a Protection creature can't be equipped by something of its Protection color is that you can't use a Magnetic Theft or similar card to attach a Behemoth Sledge to a Black Knight, for instance.

Edit:
@MindAblaze
My point is that it never really matters that Knight of Glory can't be equipped by Mask of Riddles. I can't attach Mask of Riddles to a pro-black creature anyway since I would need to target it. It's just not worth reminder text for the rare time where I'll cheat an equipment onto a creature without targeting.
